title: [1.8.8~1.5.1][smp/ssp]木材转换[永久更新]——让我换点白桦木！
author: 方块1
txt_content:
本帖最后由 方块1 于 2018-11-18 18:27 编辑 


1.介绍这是一个十分简单的小MOD，它只是增加了一些关于木材的新合成，极大的帮助了那些想在空岛或者超平坦地形生存的玩家获得不同种类的木头，并且可以将木头制品还原成木头(例如楼梯，木栅栏，栅栏门，半砖还原)，还可以把木板还原成木头，还可以吧树苗互相转换
2.合成普通合成
无序合成
3.下载地址请前往作者地址下载4.BUG.门的合成可能会出现问题.V.2.8-2以下版本可能会崩溃.V.2.8以下版本未连接互联网，起一次启动minecraft会崩溃5.注意事项木材的转换顺序：橡树 - >云杉 - >白桦 - >丛林 - >金合欢木 - >深色橡木 - >橡木
树苗的合成率只有1/3
从2.6.3开始mod开始检查更新，将会在聊天栏发出提醒，在2.8.2开始Version Checker开始接管更新监测
更新日志英文慎入

v2.8_2
        - Deleted custom update checker and added VersionChecker support
        - Implemented mcmod.info file into the code
v2.8_1
        - Fixed players not being able to connect to servers equipped with Wood Converter
v2.8
        - Updated to 1.8
        - Added recipes for the new fences
        - Added recipes for the new fence gates
        - Implemented recipes for the new doors (do not currently work for some reason)
v2.7_1
        - Updated to 1.7.10
        - Balanced sapling recipe
v2.7
        - Updated to 1.7.2
        - Added support for the two new wood types (Dark Oak & Acacia)
        - Added update message configuration
        - Changed update message (If there is a new version available, you will now see what I added/fixed :D)
        - Fixed update checker showing wrong message
v2.6_5 
        - You can now convert your Saplings! (Idea by: DragonpokeZ)
        - Fixed incompatiblity with some Forge releases
v2.6_4 
        - Added "Leaf Converter"
v2.6_3 
        - Updated to new Forge recommended build (3 rec. builds directly after each other??)
        - Added Update checker
v2.6_2 
        - Updated to Minecraft version 1.6.4 (uses Forge build #880)
        - Fixed mcmod.info file
v2.6_1
        - Updated to Minecraft version 1.6.2 (uses Forge build #789)
v2.6
        - Updated to Minecraft version 1.6.1 (uses Forge build #757)
v2.5 
        - Updated to Forge version #737 (latest recommended build) 
        - -->ModLoader development taken down due to lack of interest<--
v2.4 
        - Updated to Minecraft version 1.5.2 
        - -->ModLoader development by AzureusNation<--
v2.3_1 
        - Fixed a bug where you got a wrong metadata when crafting back slabs or stairs
v2.3 
        - The mod now requires Forge to run
v2.2_1 
        - Updated to Minecraft version 1.5.1
v2.2 
        - Updated to Minecraft version 1.5 \(^.^)/
v2.1 
        - Updated to Minecraft version 1.4.6/7
v2.0 
        - Added "Back Crafting" (Slabs to Planks, Stairs to Planks, Planks to Logs)
v1.1 
        - Added "Log Converter"
v1.0 
        - First release

我的更新-15.11左右  帖子发布-16.1.2帖子重新排版-16.1.4更新到1.8.8版本(mod版本v.2.8-3）、-16.6.6更新了1.8.9和1.9版本2018.11.8重新更新此贴
